title: FireDAO
author: FireDAO
created_time: June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMLast edit: June 24, 2023, 02:20:53 PM by FireDAO
content: FireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty manager so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: Check it out here: Services  And I can also share with you some of the top BMs in the current space: julerz12, Hhampuz, CryptopreneurBrainboss,... are all reputable BMs and have a good history in operating and managing campaigns marketing. You may need to contact them directly to discuss direction and goals and to reach an agreement between the parties.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign.  Why not instead running the signature campaign and bounty yourself, why not hire the service of a manager that will oversees all the arrangement and? Monitoring of the campaign period and activities of the participants. I think it is better that way and you will earn the trust of the members of the forum to participate in the bounty campaign and just like the user bussybuddy has mentioned the list of the professionals we have here you can make good use of one of them, once again welcome to the forum ops.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: What you need are "Bounty Manager".The more good the bounty manager, and then more people (bounty hunter) are gonna to tried to singup. It's always because the reputation, that's why people (bounty hunter) tried to get/join bounty are being publish by famous BM.Tried contact them, especially in "Service Section".

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: This list[1] looks good, although it is not up to date, so you can take a tour of the campaign managers out there and write to them.I have read your previous posts. It seems that your project is worth looking at. I did not dive into the depths, but I bookmark your page and will come back to read it again later.How long do you want to run a signature campaign? If it was for a long time, I hope to hire @LoyceV, he is an excellent member, and I did not see him running a campaign soon, so he will give you good results.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4412712.0

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: dont know about other opinion,but here it is divided into several sections, there are managers who focus only on the altcoin sector there are both and there are also those who focus only on services, so you can look there and find what you want maybe.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: It's hard to catch good posters if the reward is your native token. Atleast give a participants a token that has a current value, I'm sure that bounty hunters will flock your bounty campaign and you can choose there. You can also limit and put some requirements on the bohnty campaign like only accepting hero members above or atleast have a certain amount of merit to join. You can't expect that people from a signature campaign will transfer to the bounty campaign you have but if you reward is convincing enough, there might be good poster that can switch to your bounty campaign.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. If you're taking about the bounty managers you can employ to handle your campaign for you then there are many of which i will recommend you with only two i can trust well when it comes to bounty management.LoyceVJulerz12CryptopreneurbrainbossI will also like to recommend you LoyceV because he's one of the most reputable members of these forum that can be trusted to also handle your bounty campaign best, though am just getting to discover this from the reply made by huge black above. The campaign manager will be the ome responsible for selecting participants for you on the forum using a required standard and application format by choosing the best participant suitable.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on June 07, 2023, 02:00:26 PMHow long do you want to run a signature campaign? If it was for a long time, I hope to hire @LoyceV, he is an excellent member, and I did not see him running a campaign soon, so he will give you good results.I took a quick look at "FireDAO", and it's not something I want to support. It's another BS ponzi scam with "ape pictures".

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. Check this service. They are dealing with comprehensive marketing in crypto. They have translators, access to influencers, can run a bounty/signature campaign or mediate in the selection of a well-known bounty manager, employees for hire by the hour, developers, head hunters etc. I haven't used them, but my friend did and they delivered what was promised.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. You can try to contact bounty managers in SERVICES to run your campaign. It is better to use their services than to run it yourself. Because bounty managers already have experience and ability to handle bounty hunters. You can choose a campaign that pays weekly or a campaign that pays at the end of the phase.But most choose the second one because I think it's a win win solution for all parties.

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. Signature will be paid in native token or Stable coin? If stable coin then you can get high quality participants they will make good posts, i think first of all you should to hire a reputed bounty manager then BM will choose good participant because it’s not your job. You can hire @yahoo62278 or @LoyceV for the signature campaign manager.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. Does your bounty would be paid in tokens? Or would you do a weekly compensation like btc paid? Theres plenty of bounty management listed and suggested here but I doubt they will take on altcoin projects. There some exception but you need to prove that you are gonna pay in advance like do an escrow for your payment or even the tokens. But nowadays, its not worth it to promote ICO or alts that still on investment or raising period especially if its a very brand new one.

comments.author: FahriZah
comments.body: I,m a bounty hunter also and my favorite 2 bounty manager/community i can recommended if anyone need to best bounty manager Number 1: Bounty Detective that's my best favorite bounty manager and my second recommended is Number 2 : Brainboss bounty manager totally that's two manager best in my life just i Shared my recommended BM.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Julerz, Bounty detective or boss. To be honest, are you willing to pay your bounty participatns with unlisted token?I don't even think if that will attract so many participants. So many people never get paid by using the tokens that issued by the project. Im sure that if people will be also feeling skeptical with it. Stable token please.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAO on June 07, 2023, 08:29:41 AMFireDAO is planning to launch our signature campaign and bounty campaign very soon. We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. The way FireDAO team is going about this project is very concerning, running a bounty shouldn't be an issue for a project that knows what he or she is doing. You can run it also since I do see you spamming this forum with your frequent messages, so if you don't have anything you are doing just do it yourself but if you are busy, contract it to the most trusted people in the space base on the trust level there are a lot of them, but it also comes with a price.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: If you find yourself struggling to select suitable bounty hunters and signature participants on your own, it can indeed be a challenging endeavor. Instead, it would be advisable to seek out a reliable and experienced campaign manager from a reputable forum. By hiring such an individual, you can delegate the responsibility of overseeing the entire process, ensuring that only legitimate hunters and participants are recruited for your campaign.

We know that there are alot of experience players here that can provide us very informative tips. Please recommend a few trusted and reliable bounty hunter so that we can have a great start when taking off our marketing campaign. The problem is not looking for a trusted person for bounties, the problem today is finding a project to trust and not waste people's time, hope make sense what i say...

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Everyone can be a bounty hunter but ryza is right that what you need is not a bounty hunter but a bounty manager. But given that Loyce has given you already the feed back.I doubt that the reputable managers will give you a try to manage your bounty. There can be some other managers that might accept your offer but they might not be reputable.
